statements: SELECT * FROM nanomaterials
SELECT material_id, material_name, chemical_formula FROM nanomaterials WHERE molecular_weight > 100
SELECT material_name AS name, melting_point FROM nanomaterials ORDER BY melting_point DESC
SELECT * FROM nanomaterials WHERE band_gap_energy < 3.0
SELECT chemical_formula, molecular_weight FROM nanomaterials ORDER BY molecular_weight ASC
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM nanomaterials WHERE molecular_weight > 1000
SELECT material_name, melting_point, band_gap_energy FROM nanomaterials WHERE chemical_formula LIKE 'Si%'
SELECT * FROM nanomaterials ORDER BY band_gap_energy DESC, melting_point ASC
SELECT material_id, chemical_formula FROM nanomaterials WHERE melting_point < 500 AND band_gap_energy > 2.0
SELECT material_name, material_id, molecular_weight FROM nanomaterials WHERE material_name LIKE '%oxide%'
SELECT * FROM Molecular_Structures;
SELECT material_name, chemical_formula FROM Molecular_Structures ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, molecular_weight FROM Molecular_Structures WHERE molecular_weight > 100;
SELECT analysis_date, analysis_result FROM Analysis_Data ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, analysis_result FROM Molecular_Structures JOIN Analysis_Data ON Molecular_Structures.material_id = Analysis_Data.material_id;
SELECT material_name, chemical_formula FROM Molecular_Structures;
SELECT * FROM Analysis_Data WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT material_id, molecular_weight FROM Molecular_Structures WHERE molecular_weight > 100;
SELECT material_name, analysis_result FROM Molecular_Structures JOIN Analysis_Data ON Molecular_Structures.material_id = Analysis_Data.material_id;
SELECT analysis_id, material_id, analysis_date FROM Analysis_Data ORDER BY material_id ASC, analysis_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT name, affiliation FROM Researchers WHERE email='example@example.com';
SELECT id, name, structure FROM Nanomaterials ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, technique, analysis_results FROM Characterization WHERE technique='TEM';
SELECT id, name, molecular_weight FROM Nanomaterials WHERE molecular_weight > 100;
SELECT * FROM Nanomaterials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, molecular_weight FROM Nanomaterials ORDER BY molecular_weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM Nanomaterials JOIN Characterization ON Nanomaterials.id = Characterization.nanomaterial_id;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT name, affiliation FROM Researchers WHERE affiliation IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Nanomaterials;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM Nanomaterials WHERE material_type = 'Metal';
SELECT material_name, molecular_structure FROM Nanomaterials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM Nanomaterials WHERE material_id = 3;
SELECT plan_name, researcher_name, materials_needed FROM ResearchPlans WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM Nanomaterials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MaterialProperties WHERE density > 1.5;
SELECT plan_name, researcher_name FROM ResearchPlans WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT material_name, molecular_structure FROM Nanomaterials WHERE material_type = 'Carbon Nanotube';
SELECT * FROM AnalysisResults ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Nanomaterials;
SELECT material_name, structure FROM Nanomaterials WHERE size > 100;
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation FROM Researcher ORDER BY researcher_id DESC;
SELECT material_name, size, structure FROM Nanomaterials WHERE material_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT COUNT(property_id), AVG(property_value) FROM Properties WHERE material_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Nanomaterials WHERE size > 100
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation FROM Researcher WHERE researcher_id = 2
SELECT material_name, structure, size FROM Nanomaterials WHERE material_id = 3
SELECT experiment_id, researcher_id, material_id, experiment_date, result FROM Experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC
SELECT material_name, property_name, property_value FROM Nanomaterials JOIN Properties ON Nanomaterials.material_id = Properties.material_id
